name: filebrowser-quantum
description: A customized fork of Filebrowser with enhancements for file organization and UI changes. Runs in a container or standalone executable, offers authentication, sharing, and folder-based browsing through a responsive web interface.
features: Enhanced File Management: Improved UI over standard Filebrowser, Better organization, Responsive design. Modern file browsing.
Authentication: User login and permissions. Secure access.
Sharing: Generate share links. Easy collaboration.
Standalone or Container: Flexible deployment. Quick setup.
File Previews: View documents and images. Quick inspection.
Search: Find files quickly. Efficient navigation.
Custom Commands: Execute scripts on files. Automation support.
